itemDisplayName: CloudLens with FireAI IDS Deployement Template
description: This template shows how to setup network visibility in the public cloud using the CloudLens agent to tap traffic on one vm and forward it to the IDS, in this case FireAI.
summary: This template creates a vm with a CloudLens agent that listens on a virtual interface where we send some malware packets and forwards the captured traffic for analysis to the FireAI IDS vm.
